name: Space Station Invader VR
description:
Explore the space facilities by jumpings, fallings, and moving platforms. Enjoy the dizziness brought by this game!

Background

There is a nuclear facility inside a space station. Your mission is to eliminate enemies of the station to prevent it from destroying the Earth.

Features

  • Low-Gravity Space Environment
  • Different Weapons, eg. Rifle, Shotgun, Grenade, etc
  • Movement with Thrusters, Platforms, Fallings, etc






This game is created by a solo indie. If you enjoy the game, please consider following my youtube and twitter @TesseraktZero
